DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate proportion patient present high cardiovascular risk estimate SCORE scale , general practice consultation 7 French region ( Paris area , North-East , Paris basin , West , South-West , South- East , Mediterranean area )
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk General Practice France : Cardiovascular Risk Week
DOC.criteria: Without personal history coronary disease Non treat lipidlowering agent Lipid test = 1 year old Presenting least one cardiovascular risk Visiting General Practitioner
